titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the George Meyer family photos and memorabilia MS 774
titlestmt.author: Lee Pecht

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-10-18 18:44:30 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.unittitle: George Meyer family photos and memorabilia
did.abstract: The George Meyer Family Photos and Memorabilia contains family photos, photos of the Loraine and George B. Meyer house on Holcombe Blvd. in Houston, a catalog of the company business, and a resolution on the death of Joseph F. Meyer.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: No biographical information is known about Loraine and George B. Meyer.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The George Meyer Family Photos and Memorabilia contains family photos, photos of the Loraine and George B. Meyer house on Holcombe Blvd. in Houston, a catalog of the company business, and a resolution on the death of Joseph F. Meyer.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research.
Stored off-site at the Library Service Center. Please request this material via woodson@rice.edu or call 713-348-2586.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Karen Hess Rogers, May 8, 2018.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: George Meyer Family Photos and Memorabilia, MS 774, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Meyerland Plaza development photos and newsclips MS 115

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Pemission to publish material from the George Meyer Family Photos and Memorabilia must be obtained from the Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

did.unittitle: Photo album: Residence of Loraine and George B. Meyer, 1907 Holcombe Blvd, Houston, TX
Resolution adopted by the Board of Directors of Houston National Bank in memory of Joseph F. Meyer, Sr.
Catalog: Jos. F. Meyer Co. Automobile Supplies
Family photos: Groups, Leota Meyer Hess, business interiors; Karen Hess, George Hess
